channel.title: Video on Combinant
channel.description: Recent content in Video on Combinant

item.title: Movie for drivers visiting Combinant
item.description: Dear all, Below you'll find a instruction movie for your drivers, explaining what to do at Combinant nv.

item.title: Hercules Trophy 2010
item.description: Combinant nv particepated on the teambuilding event which is held in the Nekker in Mechelen. An impression underneath...

item.title: First train departure towards Novara
item.description: On wednesday 14th of June the first train towards Novara left the Combinant terminal fully occupied with units from Ewals Cargo Care.

item.title: Opening reception Combinant
item.description: Een impression of the opening reception on April 29th 2010...

item.title: Combinant on ATV
item.description: "The new railterminal 'Combinant', in the harbor of Antwerp, next to BASF, was officialy opened today. The new terminal should keep more containers of the road." Bron: http://www.atv.be/item/combinant

item.title: Combinant on the VTM News
item.description: "A new railterminal was presented in the harbour of Antwerp. It loads containers on a train and keeps them from the road. The demand for such a terminal is big." Source: http://www.vtm.be/nieuws/binnenland/38460

item.title: First Combinant train on LoydTV
item.description: On March 1st the first train departed from the new Combinant railterminal in the harbour of Antwerp. LoydTV followed the operation step-by-step. Source: http://www.lloyd.be/nl/lloydtv/item.php?id=255

item.title: Assembly of first Combinant crane
item.description: A historical moment for Combinant: the assembly of the first crane... Bron: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jXAb1_aCmgA
